title: 'Mr. Metal Metal Polish Liquid, Non-Abrasive, Multipurpose for Sterling Silver, Brass, Stainless Steel, Chrome and Silver, Grime and Tarnish Remover'
features: Multi Purpose Cleaner for Metal: Instantly dissolve tarnish and grime from all metal surfaces with Mr. Metal metal cleaner! Make household cleaning easy and efficient with this handy metal polishing compound that will tackle all your metals.

Cleans, Shines & Protects All Metal: From the finest sterling silver to the dullest auto wheels and marine hardware, Mr. Metal aluminum polish will bring life back to your valuables! Our tarnish remover for silver not only removes tarnish but also leaves behind a protective coating to reduce future dulling.
One-Step Polish: With Mr. Metal brass polish, no rubbing or buffing is necessary! Simply wipe Mr. Metal silver tarnish remover on your goods, then wipe off for a gleaming, long-lasting shine.

No Harm to Surfaces: This sterling silver polish is uniquely formulated with no harsh abrasives. Use this as a silver polish for silverware, tarnish remover for jewelry, antiques, dinnerware, and more will not damage even the most ornate designs or clear coat metals.

All-Purpose House Cleaning Supplies: Whether you use Mr. Metal as a chrome cleaner, copper polish, pewter cleaner, stainless steel polish, brass cleaner and polish, or aluminum cleaner, this polish compound will always be your go-to metal cleaner and polish!
description: Mr. Metal Liquid Metal Polish cleans, shines and protects all metal instantly. Dissolves tarnish and grime without abrasives. Will not harm metal surfaces. Remove ornate designs or harm clear coat metals. Tarnish guard protection leaves a protective coating that prevents tarnish and dulling. Simply wipe on and wipe off, no buffing is necessary. Size: 8 Ounce Exclusive cleaning system dissolves tarnish and grime without abrasives. Won't harm metal surfaces, remove ornate designs or harm clear coat metals. No need to buff or polish...simply wipe on and wipe off. One-of-a-kind Tarnish Guard protection leaves a protective coating that prevents tarnish and dulling. Made in USA.
